scripts.css: yarn run sass && yarn run autoprefixer
scripts.sass: yarn run node-sass src/scss/style.scss assets/css/style.css --output-style compressed --source-map assets/css/
scripts.autoprefixer: yarn run postcss --use autoprefixer -o assets/css/style.min.css assets/css/style.css
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run ejs && yarn run cp & yarn run css
scripts.build:prod: yarn run clean && NODE_ENV=production yarn run ejs && yarn run cp & yarn run css
